news_header: President Trump participated in the Nascar season opener at Daytona, while a rainstorm caused damage in LA County. The film 'Conclave' leads BAFTA nominations, and a dog named Monty won a top prize in New York.
news_original_title: Watch: Trump's motorcade drives lap of Daytona 500 racetrack
news_text: A bridge in Minnesota was destroyed due to flooding, and an officer rescued a man from a fishing boat. A bronze sculpture of a soccer star was unveiled, and the BBC analyzed US tariffs on Canada. A plane and helicopter collision resulted in multiple fatalities, and thousands protested in Los Angeles. A small plane crash killed six people, and a crew chief was involved in the earlier helicopter incident.
